prompts: Create a playful electric-type Pokemon with bright colors and cute features.
Show me a small Pokemon that excels in speed and agility.
Design a cheerful Pokemon with large ears and a friendly expression.
Generate a creature resembling a small rabbit, bursting with energy and joy.
